sentences.en: Chapter 3 puts forward the networked manufacturing configuration modeling method of motor based on axiomatic design.
sentences.cn: 第三章提出了基于公理设计的电机产品网络化制造配置建模方法.

sentences.en: Defines the concept of well sets in MS ( axiomatic medium set theory ) and discusses its characters.
sentences.cn: 在中介公理集合论系统 ( MS ) 中重新定义了良集的概念,讨论了它的性质.

sentences.en: It is axiomatic ( to say ) that a whole is greater than any of its parts.
sentences.cn: 整体大于其任何一部分是 公理 .

sentences.en: It is axiomatic that as people grow older they generally become less agile.
sentences.cn: 人年纪越大通常灵活性越差，这是不言而喻的。

sentences.en: It is axiomatic that life is not always easy.
sentences.cn: 生活并不总是一帆风顺，这是明摆着的事实。

sentences.en: IT IS usually axiomatic that when your customers are in trouble, you are too.
sentences.cn: 当你的顾客身处困境时, 你也好不了.

sentences.en: It was once regarded as axiomatic that globalisation would marginalise politics.
sentences.cn: 全球化将使政治边缘化在过去曾被当作不言自明的真理。

sentences.en: The crowning achievement of the axiomatic approach is the theory of perfect competition.
sentences.cn: 公理化方法的最高成就就是完全竞争理论.

sentences.en: The paper gave two basic principle of axiomatic design theory.
sentences.cn: 同时给出了公理设计理论的两个基本公理.

sentences.en: The systematic, formal, axiomatic development of the logic of all forms and models of being.
sentences.cn: 事物的所有表示和模型的逻辑的,系统的, 正式的, 和公理性的开发.

sentences.en: Therefore , a method integrating axiomatic design and TRIZ is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了集成公理化设计理论与TRIZ解决设计问题的一种方法.

sentences.en: These three reasons let the spread of axiomatic method stagnate for a long time.
sentences.cn: 正是这三个原因造成了当时公理化方法传播的停滞.

trans.tran_cn: <正>公理的，不证自明的，原则的，格言的
trans.tran_en: something that is axiomatic does not need to be proved because you can easily see that it is true
